name: JQ: Beautiful Japan
description: JQ: Beautiful Japan - In this game you can test your knowledge of two Japanese alphabet: hiragana and katakana.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
